resources.string: This will define the characteristics of your alarm
Beep Beep This is your alarm
Every Day - no rest for you!
This will be included for the talking alarm
How long will the alarm snooze for
What sound will the Alarm make
Will access your local Weather Info and include this information
Get owt!, Get owt! Get downn! Get up! Hurry
What the hell are you doing!
Oh my my, you are fantastic!

string-array.name: nerd_array
string-array.item: The Mona Lisa has no eyebrows. It was the fashion in Renaissance Florence to shave them off! She is ugly
There are over 58 million dogs in the U.S! Thats animal dogs.
Windmills always turn counter-clockwise. Except for the windmills in Ireland!... Irish weirdos!
Recycling one glass jar, saves enough energy to watch T.V for 3 hours. Alternatively, stop watching T.V
Over 10,000 birds a year die from smashing into windows. Lets ban windows
Men are 6 times more likely to be struck by lightning than women!. Thats because they want to be struck.
In the year 2000, Pope John Paul the second was named an Honorary Harlem Globetrotter. He was the best one.
Human teeth are almost as hard as rocks. Lets play teeth, paper, scissors!
Every day 20 banks are robbed. The average take is 2,500 dollars. Except in Ireland, where the banks rob the people.

string-array.name: helen_array
string-array.item: I think you are the best.
Today will be super now that you are here.
I would vote for you for President.
Do not worry about a thing, you are super capable.
You are so hot, I could fry eggs on you.
Damn! you keep getting better looking!
Row Row Row your boat, gently down the stream, merrily merrily merrily merrily, life is but a dream.

string-array.name: andy_array
string-array.item: I shake an onion in your hair ... and poke my finger in your nose.
Your room is smelly like your armpit.
I wave a smelly sock in your face and cough in your general direction.
I have hidden your shoes, you will never find them.
Your toothbrush is now in the toilet. I rejoice in this.
You have a stupid phone, but some people say : like phone, like user.
You cannot keep ignoring me, I will throw up in your shoes and sit on your cat.
Im using up the battery on your phone, soon, I will be ruler of your world muh hahahahaha haha
You are stubborn like a mule. And have a strange taste in music. But I like you.
I give up. You ignore everything I say. This relationship is not working out. Aaaaaaaaaaaaarrrrrgh. Get up!
